title: Microsoft Edge: Smart Find
description:
Searching for a word or phrase on a webpage has become easier with AI. Even if you misspell a word in your search query, weâ€™ll suggest related matches and words making it effortless to find what you're looking for. When you search, simply select the suggested link to quickly locate the desired word or phrase. Administrators can control the availability using the RelatedMatchesCloudServiceEnabled policy.
More info: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/edge/features/smart-find
